title: Mount Rainier National Park: Northeast Area
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Trails     Northeast Area                 Northeast Area Trails        Silver Forest Trail, a short nature trail, is one of many trails located in the Sunrise area. NPS/Emily Brouwer   Â    Northeast Area Trails ***All mileages are roundtrip.***     Burroughs Mountain Trail (7 miles) Crystal Lakes Trail (6 miles) Glacier Basin Trail (7 miles) Mystic Lake via Sunrise Trail (21 miles) Mt. Fremont Lookout Trail (5.5 miles) Naches Peak Loop Trail (3.5 miles)   Owyhigh Lakes Trail (7 miles) Palisades Lakes Trail (7 miles) Summerland Trail (8.5 miles)     Other Trails The Wonderland Trail Day Hiking & Family Nature Trails Northwest Area Trails Southwest Area Trails Southeast Area Trails
